entries.title: Twitter auctions off blue bird memorabilia, pricey furniture
entries.description: A neon Twitter bird for $35,000, anyone? How about a used industrial kitchen mixer for a good price? Going once...

entries.title: These are all the public universities that have instituted TikTok bans
entries.description: At least 27 public universities have restricted access to TikTok on school computers, mobile phones and Wi-Fi.

entries.title: U.S. says Russian national ran crypto exchange widely used by cybercriminals
entries.description: The U.S. has arrested a Russian national and founder of a cryptocurrency exchange on charges of allegedly laundering more than $700 million, the Department of J

entries.title: Microsoft to lay off 10,000 workers, citing concern about a possible recession
entries.description: Microsoft said Wednesday it would cut 10,000 jobs worldwide amid a slowing global economy.

entries.title: Donald Trump prepares for his return to Facebook and Twitter
entries.description: Mounting a comeback for the White House, Donald Trump is looking to regain control over his powerful social media accounts.

entries.title: Top Twitter influencers say platform is getting worse under Musk
entries.description: Since Elon Musk took over Twitter in October 2022, some of the platform’s most active and popular users say they’ve witnessed turmoil as a result of changes.
